folder: West 231st Street & West, Corlear to Riverdale Avenues., Bronx, NY
text:
West 231st Street, west from Conlear Ave. to Riverdale Ave., showing W.P.A. men at work on a street and sidewalk repair job.

November 12, 1936.

Works Progress Administration.
Federal Art Project photo.
title: Bronx: West 231st Street - West, Corlear to Riverdale Avenues.
